Uses of Package
com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit

  • Packages that use com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.measure.credit
    Calculation functions for credit products.
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit
    Calculators for credit instruments, such as Credit Default Swap (CDS).
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.sensitivity
    Calculators for sensitivities.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit used by com.opengamma.strata.measure.credit 
    Class and Description
    CreditRatesProvider
    The rates provider, used to calculate analytic measures.
